thread.section_title: American Freight Furniture & Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Freight Furniture & Mattress | americanfreight.us
thread.title: Kimberly Thomas-Taylor
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Kimberly Thomas-Taylor

author: Kimberly Thomas-Taylor
title: Kimberly Thomas-Taylor
text: They have commercial on TV, 7 piece living room set for $398 and show many styles. But when we get there the only one in deal is an ugly green couch that may look good in college dorm. That happens every time. That is my only issue. Sales people are nice and still make a deal with us but not much of a selection for our budget.
